name: Prison of my Own
description:
an unfinished attempt for my first game jam summer 2021! a bunch of friends with literally no gamedev experience came together and an attempt was made. we may be continuing this project in the future!

the screenshots are currently holding our tentative level design sketches and some of the art assets from our lovely art team, since we haven't been able to implement a whole bunch.

programming: nonfriction, theskyrage, skeetdaddy69, adagfs, bluexj

game and level design: cremedelacreme, andersmith, avyary, kalelibertas

art: wistwyrm, makurophage

music and sfx: avyary

sound effect recordings were taken from freesounds.org!
